content.question: For two populations of rabbits, R and S, the proportions of rabbits with white markings on their fur are given as <math alttext="P sub R" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>p</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>R</mtext></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="P sub S" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>p</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>S</mtext></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>, respectively. Suppose that independent random samples of 50 rabbits from R and 100 rabbits from S are selected. Let <math alttext="P hat sub R" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mover accent="true"><mrow><mi>p</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>^</mo></mrow></mover></mrow><mrow><mtext>R</mtext></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> be the sample proportion of rabbits with white markings from R, and let <math alttext="P hat sub S" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mover accent="true"><mrow><mi>p</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>^</mo></mrow></mover></mrow><mrow><mtext>S</mtext></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> be the sample proportion of rabbits with white markings from S. What is the standard deviation of the sampling distribution of <math alttext="P hat sub R minus P hat sub S" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mover accent="true"><mrow><mi>p</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>^</mo></mrow></mover></mrow><mrow><mtext>R</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>−</mo><msub><mrow><mover accent="true"><mrow><mi>p</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>^</mo></mrow></mover></mrow><mrow><mtext>S</mtext></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="P sub R minus P sub S" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>p</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>R</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>−</mo><msub><mrow><mi>p</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>S</mtext></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction P sub R, end subscript, times, open parenthesis, 1 minus P sub R, close parenthesis, over 50, end fraction, plus the fraction P sub S, end subscript, times, open parenthesis, 1 minus P sub S, close parenthesis, over 100" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>p</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>R</mtext></mrow></msub><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><msub><mrow><mi>p</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>R</mtext></mrow></msub></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mrow><mn>50</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>p</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>S</mtext></mrow></msub><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><msub><mrow><mi>p</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>S</mtext></mrow></msub></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mrow><mn>100</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the square root of the fraction P hat sub R times, open parenthesis, 1 minus P hat sub R, close parenthesis, over 100, plus the fraction P hat sub S times, open parenthesis, 1 minus P hat sub S, close parenthesis, over 50, end root" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><msqrt><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><msub><mrow><mover accent="true"><mrow><mi>p</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>^</mo></mrow></mover></mrow><mrow><mtext>R</mtext></mrow></msub><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><msub><mrow><mover accent="true"><mrow><mi>p</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>^</mo></mrow></mover></mrow><mrow><mtext>R</mtext></mrow></msub></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mrow><mn>100</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mrow><msub><mrow><mover accent="true"><mrow><mi>p</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>^</mo></mrow></mover></mrow><mrow><mtext>S</mtext></mrow></msub><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><msub><mrow><mover accent="true"><mrow><mi>p</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>^</mo></mrow></mover></mrow><mrow><mtext>S</mtext></mrow></msub></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mrow><mn>50</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></mrow></msqrt></mrow></math>

<math alttext="the square root of P sub R times, open parenthesis, 1 minus P sub R, close parenthesis, over 50, plus the fraction P sub S times, open parenthesis, 1 minus P sub S, close parenthesis, over 100, end root" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msqrt><mrow><mfrac><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>p</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>R</mtext></mrow></msub><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><msub><mrow><mi>p</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>R</mtext></mrow></msub></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mrow><mn>50</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>p</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>S</mtext></mrow></msub><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><msub><mrow><mi>p</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>S</mtext></mrow></msub></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mrow><mn>100</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the square root of the fraction P hat sub R, end subscript, times, open parenthesis, 1 minus P hat sub R, close parenthesis, over 50, end fraction, plus the fraction P hat sub S, end subscript, times, open parenthesis, 1 minus P hat sub S, close parenthesis, over 100, end root" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msqrt><mrow><mfrac><mrow><msub><mrow><mover accent="true"><mrow><mi>p</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>^</mo></mrow></mover></mrow><mrow><mtext>R</mtext></mrow></msub><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><msub><mrow><mover accent="true"><mrow><mi>p</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>^</mo></mrow></mover></mrow><mrow><mtext>R</mtext></mrow></msub></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mrow><mn>50</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mrow><msub><mrow><mover accent="true"><mrow><mi>p</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>^</mo></mrow></mover></mrow><mrow><mtext>S</mtext></mrow></msub><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><msub><mrow><mover accent="true"><mrow><mi>p</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>^</mo></mrow></mover></mrow><mrow><mtext>S</mtext></mrow></msub></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mrow><mn>100</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the square root of P sub R times, open parenthesis, 1 minus P sub R, close parenthesis, over 50, plus the fraction P sub S times, open parenthesis, 1 minus P sub S, close parenthesis, over 100, end root" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msqrt><mrow><mfrac><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>p</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>R</mtext></mrow></msub><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><msub><mrow><mi>p</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>R</mtext></mrow></msub></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mrow><mn>50</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>p</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>S</mtext></mrow></msub><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><msub><mrow><mi>p</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>S</mtext></mrow></msub></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mrow><mn>100</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mstyle></math>

topic.text: 5.6: Sampling Distributions for Differences in Sample Proportions

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Determine parameters for probability distributions.
